Text:
I put up this torrent because I know a lot of people have been looking for this episode.  This is my first time trying to encode a show before.

I hope I didn't do too badly.  Any useful comments appreciated.

I'll post after viewing attempt. Also, I'll post the format/file type (helpful for future reference). I've never seen this file size for an episode before, so I hope for the best. Thanks for trying anyway, to break through the muck of so many fake ones.
Well, you did it. It's a bit blurry, audio is fine. AVI format. I don't have much experience with encoding, but from what I've seen, Xvid looks sharper. Thanks.
Thanks for the feedback.  At least I'm headed in the right direction (smile).
